variables.description: Text Var to hold the Opp Closed Stage since the Close Opp Subflow would not accept using Stage within the recordId variable.

variables.description: Text Var to hold the Sub Stage for the purposes of the Close Opp Subflow since the Subflow would not accept using Sub Stage within the recordId variable.
variables.name: v_Opp_Sub_Stage
